channel.title: PLEASE HELP (Making magic hit over 30 [delta])
channel.description:
Hey, trying to make any spell (inparticular sara strike) hit over 30, but i only want it for certain ppl so i was thinking in like an item... (dragonstone ring). so i set the stats for that all at 5000 however it will only let me 1hit ko people with melee not magic... i cant figure this out and it is really bugging me if someone could help id really appreciate it
ps: this is a delta

item.title: PLEASE HELP (Making magic hit over 30 [delta])
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[quote=“party kid, post:3, topic:463003”]Found it in magichandler.java just didnt look hard enough, thanks bro.

if (spellID == 1190) { if (p.SaradominStrike) { p.spellHit = 30; } } if (spellID == 1191) { if (p.GuthixClaws) { p.spellHit = 30; } } if (spellID == 1192) { if (p.ZamorakFlames) { p.spellHit = 30; }[/quote]

you seriously couldnt figure this out?

Read full topic
